thread.title: Ricky Martin on his modern love story as he reveals he met fiance on Instagram
thread.title_full: Ricky Martin on his modern love story as he reveals he met fiance on Instagram

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Ricky Martin on his modern love story as he reveals he met fiance on Instagram
text:
Showbiz Ricky Martin on his modern love story as he reveals he met fiance on Instagram Ricky started dating the painter in April 2016 and the pair announced their engagement on The Ellen DeGeneres Show in November of that year Share Instagram scroller: Ricky Martin (Photo: Splash News)   Thank you for subscribing!   
Ricky Martin has revealed he met his fiance Jwan Yosef on Instagram - so, yes, there is still hope for us all. 
The singer appeared on Andy Cohen's Radio Andy SiriusXM show this week where he discussed his very modern love story. 
Revealing he's a big art collector, Ricky said he was looking at art on the social media site. 
“I met my fiance on Instagram,” the 45-year-old singer explained. “I am an art collector and he’s an artist.” (Photo: Getty Images) 
“I’m scrolling and I see this beautiful piece of art,” he added. “I wrote to him. And we were talking for, like, six months without me hearing his voice.” 
Ricky says at first they were just friends, but then he flew to London - where Jwan lived - to meet him. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
